entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 18 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this afternoon then partly cloudy. Blowing snow at times early this morning. Wind northeast 40 km/h diminishing to 20 this morning then becoming light near noon. Temperature falling to minus 18 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Forecast issued 04:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 21 with temperature rising to minus 16 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming north 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 21 with temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
